Task: Multi-Label Multi-Class Classification for Medical Texts
Description: The task involves classifying detailed medical case descriptions into multi-label multi-class classification targets. Each input text is associated with multiple labels, representing a diagnosis and a corresponding treatment or medication recommendation.

diagnosis.description: A label indicating the diagnosed condition or finding (e.g., 'Arthritis', 'Common Cold', 'Unknown').

treatment.description: A label indicating the recommended treatment or medication (e.g., 'beta blockers', 'antibiotics', 'pain killers', 'Unknown').
